mapper.sql: PK_ID, COP_NO, PLAN_NAME, TERM, GROSS_RATE, TOTAL_AMT, EDIT_BALANCE, BALANCE, START_DATE, END_DATE, OPER_USER_ID, OPER_DATE, OPER_TIME, MEMO, IS_HIS, FIRST_END_DATE, OPER_TYPE, AMT_SOURCES, FUNDER_ID, SETTLE_AT_BANK_NAME, SETTLE_BANK_NAME, SETTLE_ACOUNT_NO, INSU_COMPANY, SETTLE_ACOUNT_NAME
mapper.insert: insert into PRJ_COP_TRUST_PLAN (PK_ID, COP_NO, PLAN_NAME, TERM, GROSS_RATE, TOTAL_AMT, EDIT_BALANCE, BALANCE, START_DATE, END_DATE, OPER_USER_ID, OPER_DATE, OPER_TIME, MEMO, IS_HIS, FIRST_END_DATE, OPER_TYPE, AMT_SOURCES, FUNDER_ID, SETTLE_AT_BANK_NAME, SETTLE_BANK_NAME, SETTLE_ACOUNT_NO, INSU_COMPANY, SETTLE_ACOUNT_NAME ) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{copNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{term,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grossRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{editBalance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHis,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{firstEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{amtSources,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleAtBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleAcountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleAcountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update PRJ_COP_TRUST_PLAN
COP_NO = #{copNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_NAME = #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERM = #{term,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROSS_RATE = #{grossRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_AMT = #{totalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EDIT_BALANCE = #{editBalance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_USER_ID = #{operUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_DATE = #{operDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_TIME = #{operTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_HIS = #{isHis,jdbcType=CHAR},
FIRST_END_DATE = #{firstEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_TYPE = #{operType,jdbcType=CHAR},
AMT_SOURCES = #{amtSources,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUNDER_ID = #{funderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_AT_BANK_NAME = #{settleAtBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_BANK_NAME = #{settleBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_ACOUNT_NO = #{settleAcountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSU_COMPANY = #{insuCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SETTLE_ACOUNT_NAME = #{settleAcountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PRJ_COP_TRUST_PLAN set COP_NO = #{copNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAN_NAME = #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERM = #{term,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROSS_RATE = #{grossRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_AMT = #{totalAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EDIT_BALANCE = #{editBalance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_USER_ID = #{operUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_DATE = #{operDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_TIME = #{operTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HIS = #{isHis,jdbcType=CHAR}, FIRST_END_DATE = #{firstEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_TYPE = #{operType,jdbcType=CHAR}, AMT_SOURCES = #{amtSources,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUNDER_ID = #{funderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_AT_BANK_NAME = #{settleAtBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_BANK_NAME = #{settleBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_ACOUNT_NO = #{settleAcountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSU_COMPANY = #{insuCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_ACOUNT_NAME = #{settleAcountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.COP_NO as copNo, a.PLAN_NAME as planName, a.TERM as term, a.GROSS_RATE as grossRate, a.TOTAL_AMT as totalAmt, a.EDIT_BALANCE as editBalance, a.BALANCE as balance, a.START_DATE as startDate, a.END_DATE as endDate, a.OPER_USER_ID as operUserId, a.OPER_DATE as operDate, a.OPER_TIME as operTime, a.MEMO as memo, a.IS_HIS as isHis, a.FIRST_END_DATE as firstEndDate, a.OPER_TYPE as operType, a.AMT_SOURCES as amtSources, a.FUNDER_ID as funderId, a.SETTLE_AT_BANK_NAME as settleAtBankName, a.SETTLE_BANK_NAME as settleBankName, a.SETTLE_ACOUNT_NO as settleAcountNo, a.INSU_COMPANY as insuCompany, a.SETTLE_ACOUNT_NAME as settleAcountName from acc_loan t,Prj_Cop_Trust_Plan a where t.bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.funder_id = t.funder_id and a.cop_no = #{copNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
